name: SaaSID
tag_list: cloud, security, sso, authentication, salesforce, audit, compliance, policy, browser, google
overview:
SaaSID provides authentication, management and auditing solutions that help organisations address the productivity, security and compliance issues associated with the growing use of Web applications and implementation of BYOD initiatives within the wider consumerisation of IT in the enterprise environment.

SaaSID helps businesses of any size leverage the full benefits of the Cloud while:

Increasing productivity and reducing IT administration and operational cost. Offering granular, on-premise like, policy-based access control and application management. Meeting audit and compliance needs.

SaaSID is the only vendor in the Single Sign-On (SSO) market space to go beyond traditional SSO capabilities and provide organisations with a detailed audit trail and reporting of all user activity in any browser-based applications – from initial login, to capturing all user interaction with the application and associated data, to logout.
